headline: How Appleâ€™s Vietnam Manufacturing Deal With BYD (SEHK:1211) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In recent days, Apple announced plans to expand its manufacturing in Vietnam for smart home devices and iPads, partnering with BYD for final assembly, testing, and packaging of upcoming products. This collaboration highlights BYD's growing influence as a hardware supplier beyond electric vehicles, even as it manages heightened regulatory and operational challenges at home and abroad. We'll explore how the record vehicle recall and lowered sales outlook may reshape BYD's investment narrative...
